channel.title: 317 shop prices
channel.description: in prices on my server when i put 25000 in it buys the rune scimmy off you for 7k but then i change it to 40,000 and it buys it of you 12k and sells it like 50k i want to make it so it dont buy it off players so low and dont sell to high can anyone help me please thank you
